nodes.text: This crest was used by Admiral Trench as his personal symbol. He used it to mark both his flagships and his own clothing.
This crest was seen on Trench's flagship during the Battle of Malastare Narrows.
It was the very same crest, present on the Separatist dreadnought Invincible, that clued Admiral Wullf Yularen in on the identity of his opponent at the Battle of Christophsis.
During the Battle of Anaxes at the end of the war, a super tactical droid serving under Admiral Trench bore the crest on his upper torso.
